Huntsville.Madison Square Mall: Madison Square Mall was the largest enclosed shopping center in Huntsville, Alabama encompassing over 929,993 sq ft (86,399.2 m2). It was also the oldest extant enclosed shopping mall (after The Heart of Huntsville Mall closed) in the city until its closure in 2017. The mall was located on the corner of University Drive (US 72) and Research Park Boulevard (SR-255).
